activities: Collection, analysis, aggregation and reporting of data for individual, leadership, group and organizational development submitted via completed questionnaires in paper or responses transmitted on-line.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: The company has enrolled in The Council of Better Business Bureaus Inc.'s (BBB) Safe Harbor Privacy Dispute Resolution program, for HR Data, the EU Data Protection Authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC).
